predicate.note: Frames file for 'allude' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with adverbials
example.text: Mobil alluded to the work-force cuts last week when it took a $ 40 million [*U*] charge as part of its third-quarter earnings and attributed it to a restructuring .
example.arg: when it took a $ 40 million [*U*] charge as part of its third-quarter earnings and attributed it to a restructuring
